sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-text-field :color="textcolor" :label="textlabel" v-model="Value1" :rules="[rulesNumber]"
						outlined></v-text-field>
</template>

<script>
  export default{
    name: 'TextFiles',
    props:{
      textcolor:{
        type: String
      },
      textlabel:{
        type: String,
        default: 'Value'
      }
    },
    data() {
		return {
			Value1: '',
			Value2: '',
			method: '....',
			Ans: '',
			MainID: '',
			ContainerID: '',
			history: [],
			rulesNumber: v => {
				if (!v.trim()) return true;
				if (!isNaN(parseFloat(v)) && v >= 0 && v <= 999) return true;
				return 'The Input must be in number !!!';
			},

		}
	},
  }
</script>
